name: A Hero's Manual
description:
Just ye old little interactive fiction about killing a Troll!

Honestly, it's the world ancient's tale: You are a Hero, you choose your Weapon, and off you go to slay the monster.

... But do you want to?

What if you can befriend them instead?

And what about the Wizard with some abandonment issues who is so easy to fluster, will you accept his offer?

And, most importantly... why are fairies telling you about the latest anime hit?!

Hello, thank you for playing my first serious twine game!

A basic run is around 10 minutes long, but to uncover all the possible endings you'll have to play for around fourty minutes.

Don't get discouraged if you die! It's all part of the game, and it will only enhance your experience. Feel free to leave a comment, constructive criticism is always appreciated, too.

And remember... 

The more time you take to collect objects and explore this text world, the easier it'd be to kill the troll!!

... Or, marry them. You are into what you are, I won't judge.
